router
Class ConfigurationParser

java.lang.Object
  router.ConfigurationParser

public class ConfigurationParser
extends java.lang.Object

The ConfigurationParser parses configuration files into configurations.

Nested Class Summary
static class ConfigurationParser.ConfigurationParserException
          The ConfigurationParserException class represents an error that occurred while parsing the building the Configuration.

parseLink

public static Configuration.Link parseLink(java.lang.String str)
                                    throws ConfigurationParser.ConfigurationParserException
Parse the given String into an Link.

(Performs the exact inverse of toString() )

Parameters:
str - The String to parse
Returns:
The resulting Link
Throws:
ConfigurationException - If the String can't be parsed as an Link.
